Headline: #52 Kedzie/California Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/Filmore
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie/California buses are temp. rerouted via Kedzie, Harrison, Sacramento, Roosevelt and Kedzie: due to, fire department activity near Kedzie/Filmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#52 Kedzie/California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Harrison, Sacramento, Roosevelt, Kedzie and over regular route, due to fire department activity near Kedzie/Filmore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a sick customer. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#22 Clark

#24 Wentworth

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
